title: Manage Property Key Inventory
description: A vendor needs a key to access a unit for a repair. The PM must check out a key and log it.

tasks.description: Identify the correct key for the unit from the key inventory system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the key labeled for Unit 101.

tasks.description: Log the key as 'checked out' to the specific vendor and work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The key's status is updated in the system, showing it is with 'Pro Plumbers' for work order #12345.

tasks.description: Create a reminder to follow up in 24 hours to ensure the key is returned.
tasks.expected_outcome: A task is created in the system to check for the key's return.
